content: the sandwich headband is a fully reversible colorwork headband with a flower motif on one side and a dot motif on the other the double layered fabric is made extra warm by the layers of colorwork floats sandwiched on the inside it is worked in the round and finished with i-cord edges there are no purl stitches or increases or decreases so this is an exceptionally quick and easy project to make **sizes ** teen and adult s m l **needles ** 3 5 mm us4 40 cm circular or dpns based on personal preference **gauge ** 23 sts x 31 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 in **yarn requirements ** mc 50 100 100 g dk weight yarn cc1 10 20 20 g dk weight yarn cc2 10 10 10 g dk weight yarn the sample is knit using drops flora in white held double drops daisy in brown and sandnes garn sunday in matcha held double thank you for knitting
